SEARCH
Package controller.officer.helper

Class OfficerRegistration

java.lang.Object
controller.officer.helper.OfficerRegistration
All Implemented Interfaces:
IOfficerRegistration
public class OfficerRegistration extends Object implements IOfficerRegistration
Handles registration logic for officers who wish to manage a BTO project. Officers can only register if they are not already assigned or registered, and have not applied as applicants for the same project.

      public OfficerRegistration(Officer officer, ProjectList projectList, RegistrationList registrationList, ApplicationList applicationList)

      Parameters:
      officer - the logged-in officer
      projectList - the list of all projects
      registrationList - the list of all officer registrations
      applicationList - the list of all project applications

  • Method Details

    • registerForProject

      public void registerForProject()
      Allows the officer to register for a project if they are not already assigned, and haven't applied to that project as an applicant. Prevents duplicate or invalid registrations.
      Specified by:
      registerForProject in interface IOfficerRegistration
